title: kiba
author: kiba
created_time: October 19, 2010, 05:23:42 AMLast edit: October 19, 2010, 02:15:27 PM by kiba
content: I pledge 20 BTC for whoever submit the funniest bitcoin image with the word "Bitcoin GALORE!" by the end of November.Extra bonus points for whoever use nekos and cute anime girls.Afterward, we shall begin posting Bitcoin GALORE picture whenever a breakout occurs.

comments.author: LZ
comments.created_time: October 19, 2010, 09:38:00 AMLast edit: January 22, 2018, 08:52:26 AM by LZ
comments.body: +20 BTC if it will be original and under Creative Commons Attribution Share Alike license.

comments.author: Lexington
comments.created_time: October 21, 2010, 11:09:12 PMLast edit: October 26, 2010, 03:29:21 PM by Lexington
comments.body: Here is my entry for the contestFNORDhttp://www.voodoovelvet.com

comments.author: Lexington
comments.body: This can fall under the creative commons liscense.  I hope that it will be used to promote bitcoins.

comments.author: LZ
comments.body: Quote from: Lexington on October 22, 2010, 01:21:51 AMI hope that it will be used to promote bitcoins.And I am NOT! Will be more BTC for the really cool image?

comments.author: Lexington
comments.body: Quote from: lzsaver on October 22, 2010, 03:34:49 AMQuote from: Lexington on October 22, 2010, 01:21:51 AMI hope that it will be used to promote bitcoins.And I am NOT! Will be more BTC for the really cool image? I'm not sure I understand what you mean here.  To clairify my own meaning, I intend that the image be under the creative commons liscense that you linked.  I also hope that my image will be used to promote bitcoins.

comments.author: LZ
comments.body: No, I just wanted to say that I don't like your image.

comments.author: kiba
comments.body: Quote from: lzsaver on October 22, 2010, 04:23:06 AMNo, I just wanted to say that I don't like your image. Well, if nobody else submit an image. He will be the winner of the 40 BTC bounty, automatically.

comments.author: bober182

comments.author: Anonymous
comments.body: Quote from: bober182 on October 25, 2010, 06:27:14 AMA challenger appears!I vote for cat/

comments.author: Lexington
comments.body: I am respectfully withdrawing.You guys didn't really like my image anyway so no big loss to you.I enjoy contests and I thought this would be fun so I just jumped into it.However, after observation I realize that I do not want to support this. Completely without malace or regret I say good luck to you and your contest.

comments.author: LZ
comments.body: What are you talking about? Your image was better then that cat.

comments.author: kiba
comments.body: Quote from: lzsaver on October 27, 2010, 12:01:42 PMWhat are you talking about? Your image was better then that cat. Provide a picture or the cat picture will become the automatic winner.

comments.author: bober182
comments.body: he asked for a meme not a masterpiece

comments.author: kiba
comments.body: Personally, I think the cat picture will do a better job than that bear. Even so, he will win if nobody submitted an entry.

comments.author: The Eternal Coin
comments.body: I'm throwing my hat into the ring.http://img842.imageshack.us/img842/6091/rainbowzmini.jpg

comments.author: kiba
comments.body: If the picture above me is much smaller than this, I think I would vote for that image over the previous cat image.

comments.author: The Eternal Coin
comments.body: I resized it.  I did not expect it to come out so large when i first posted it.

comments.body: I asked my friend to draw something. And she agreed - so the image will be ready in coming days. Let me know if you have any special suggestions. There are outlines that I received a few days ago.
